name: InfluenzaVirusInfection
title: Influenza Virus Infection
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to influenza.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes terms in relation to Influenza A, "other" identified influenza strains, and combination terms (eg.  influenza virus with pneumonia). There are no excluded terms.),(Exclusion Criteria: There are no excluded terms.)
